mapper.select: select ifnull(sum(money),0)from waybill_customer_fee where enabled=1 and waybill_id= #{waybillId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and anomaly_id is null

select ifnull(sum(case when wfa.adjust_type=3 then wcf.money when wfa.adjust_type=4 then -(wcf.money) end ),0) as total from waybill_customer_fee wcf ,waybill_fee_adjustment wfa where wcf.id=wfa.relevance_id and wfa.relevance_type=2 and wcf.enabled=1 and wfa.enabled=1 and wcf.anomaly_id is not null and wfa.waybill_id=#{waybillId}
